com.io7m.jpismo

Interface PTextBuilderType

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PTextBuilder

    public interface PTextBuilderType
    The type of text builders.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • buildText

        PTextUnmeasuredType buildText(PTypefaceType face,
                              float font_size,
                              String text,
                              PTextWrapping wrap_mode,
                              float wrap_width)

        Build unmeasured text. The text will be wrapped based on the given wrapping mode.

        Parameters:
        face - The typeface to use
        font_size - The font size to use
        text - The text
        wrap_mode - The text wrapping mode
        wrap_width - The text wrapping width
        Returns:
        Unmeasured text based on all of the parameters given so far.

      • setAntialiasingMode

        void setAntialiasingMode(PTextAntialiasing anti)

        Set the antialiasing mode.

        Parameters:
        anti - The mode

      • setMagnificationFilter

        void setMagnificationFilter(com.io7m.jcanephora.core.JCGLTextureFilterMagnification f)

        Set the magnification filter used for the text. The default is JCGLTextureFilterMagnification.TEXTURE_FILTER_NEAREST.

        Parameters:
        f - The filter

      • setMinificationFilter

        void setMinificationFilter(com.io7m.jcanephora.core.JCGLTextureFilterMinification f)

        Set the minification filter used for the text. The default is JCGLTextureFilterMinification.TEXTURE_FILTER_NEAREST_MIPMAP_NEAREST.

        Parameters:
        f - The filter

      • setTextureType

        void setTextureType(PTextureType t)

        Set the texture type that will be used for textures. The default is PTextureType.TEXTURE_TRANSLUCENT_RGBA_NON_PREMULTIPLIED.

        Note that OpenGL ES2 is not capable of supporting almost all of the texture types, and so renderers will typically fall back to PTextureType.TEXTURE_TRANSLUCENT_RGBA_NON_PREMULTIPLIED.

        Parameters:
        t - The texture type
